data.title: Resident / NRO Deposits
data.description:
Penal Interest on pre-closure of deposits:

  • Up to Rs. 2 Crores of deposit – Penalty of 1% from applicable ROI.
  • Above Rs. 2 Crores of deposit – Pre-closure Penalty norms applicable.

Interest will be calculated at the rate applicable for the period the deposit has actually remained with the bank. The rates are subject to change without notice.
data.senior_citizen_deposits_description:
• Senior Citizen rates are not applicable to NRI.
  • Maximum Ceiling limit for acceptance of Senior Citizen deposits is Rs. 3 Crores.
data.general_description: Kindly contact the nearest branch for deposits above Rs. 2 Crores.
data.content_above_table: Check the interest rates of Savings accounts and deposits below. Rates of Interest on domestic deposits w.e.f. 13.08.2019.
